thread.title: time capsule message

comments.text: it is currently august 4th, 2021. a wednesday of no particular significance. as of today, i joined anyland 888 days ago.
that seems so long ago, but most of the stuff here is nearly twice as old as that. the game is completely dead right now. hasnt been decent groups playing at once in about 5 months
anyways, the reason i am on here at all right now is because rustybot and i were playing neos (he is currently very new still) and we wanted to export some anyland shapes.
not sure why i decided to leave this little diary entry here. its a place where nobody will find it for a very long time, if at all. the last entries before this are 3 years old.
i chose this mailbox because this nebula's place was the first place i was taken by zid on my first day on anyland. the first thing i did was break into the vault in his lab...
...and fill an inventory page with every weapon inside. jeez, that was so long ago. anyways, i should probably go now. my dog is pestering me for something; probably just attention
he's 9 btw. if you've managed to stumble upon this little message down the line, please contact me, i'd love to hear about this old entry. my discord tag is Sloppymcfloppy
or, i will probably still be in the anyland discord server. @ me. my nickname should also still be "sloppy mcfloppy" or some slight variation there.
one last little note for myself - my room is mostly finished. the floor and ceiling are done, but baseboards and doors are still missing. just my old desk, new chair, and vr are up
welp. that's it. thanks for reading, and do please try to contact me outside anyland if you've found this. ★entry terminated | -sloppy mcfloppy

thread.latestCommentText: welp. that's it. thanks for reading, and do please try to contact me outside anyland if you've found this. ★entry terminated | -sloppy mcfloppy
